reviewText: This DVD gets used 3 times a week, and I look forward to it.  I am 69 years old and found that I had to take it easy at first and not push too hard.  However, after a month I have limbered up so well that I am moving better then I have for years.  It is a great routine for any age!
We have used her tape for a long time and it broke, so we ordered a replacement. We use it every day. It is just right for us.

The quality of the product is good, cues are easy to follow.  I just prefer something with more variety that includes stretches, weights and some aerobics.  I also found a lot of things difficult to do because of my great lack of flexibility; I'm guessing that perhaps I'm just too old for this program.
